title: FPS DROPS WITH LUNAR REVEL EVENT
body: Ever since this new event came out with it's new skins, me and alot of other people are experiencing massive fps drops past 15 min mark, and it happens to everyone at the SAME time. From 300 fps to 30 fps. IT'S UNPLAYABLE. I had it every game since the event came out, and i asked every game in All-chat if it happend to anyone else and they all said it did. Please fix this issue and please do not point me to that FPS-guide. It doesn't work i tried it.
